title: Java Full Stack
description: Master front-end and back-end development using Java. Learn Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, JSP, and database integration to build scalable web applications.

syllabus.title: Java Fundamentals and OOP
syllabus.description: Java Fundamentals cover the core principles and building blocks of Java, including its environment (JVM, JRE, JDK), syntax, variables, data types, operators, control structures (if, switch, loops), and basic input/output. These essentials enable you to write simple programs and understand how Java executes code, laying the groundwork for more advanced programming.

syllabus.title: HTML/CSS/JS Basics
syllabus.description: Learn the foundational web technologies: HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity. This module covers responsive design, DOM manipulation, and basic scripting.

syllabus.title: Spring Boot Framework
syllabus.description: Understand the Spring Boot framework for building enterprise-grade applications quickly and efficiently. Topics include dependency injection, auto-configuration, and creating REST APIs.

syllabus.title: RESTful APIs with Spring
syllabus.description: Build RESTful web services using Spring, handle HTTP requests/responses, design endpoints, and integrate with front-end and mobile applications.

syllabus.title: JSP and Servlet Integration
syllabus.description: Discover how to use JSP and Servlets for building dynamic web pages and handling server-side business logic in Java applications.

syllabus.title: Database Connectivity (JDBC/MySQL)
syllabus.description: Learn how to connect Java applications to databases using JDBC, execute SQL queries, and interact with MySQL for persistent storage.

syllabus.title: Deploying Java Apps to the Web
syllabus.description: Understand deployment best practices, packaging your app, and serving Java applications over the web using servers like Tomcat.
